snippet.title: C9 | Game Play Trailer | Continent of the Ninth Seal | Webzen MMORPG
snippet.description:
Magic! Be Master of New Dark Era!

C9(Continent of the Ninth) is representative 3D fantasy online game with action packed gameplay. Not only has C9(Continent of the Ninth) FPS style controls similar to console games, but also has a fantasy-based Action RPG(role playing game) showcasing splendid graphics, a strategic battle zone system, story driven quests. 

C9(Continent of the Ninth) has slash style action, and a amazing graphics engine providing realistic and fluid graphics. You can choose and learn the path of the fighter, hunter, shaman, witch blade and perform precise keystrokes. If you start the game, you will experience 2,186 quests across five continents. Even though questing isn't vital, it will offer you assistance with crafting and job upgrades to assist you on your way to becoming a master. Also, You can manage guilds support all of the usual features a guild can offer as well as guild housing. There is legends system allows players to gain titles for actively participating in a particular region of the game. 

Have a C9 World ! Like us!
http://us.webzen.com/Download/C9
